questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Model of a steamboat

A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A model steamboat displayed in a window

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A piece of art
C) A model steamboat
D) A landscape

A) A tree
B) A car
C) A model steamboat
D) A painting

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A mountain range
B) A body of water
C) A street scene with reflections of buildings and cars
D) A forest

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A garden
B) A brick window ledge
C) A beach

A) Mississippi
B) Queen of the River

A) Metal

A) $10.00

A) Stained glass

A) New and polished

A) Trees and mountains

A) One

A) Blue

A) Minimal detail
